<page title>: Cleverboxes - PA248Q | Asus PA248Q (24 inch) LCD Monitor 80000000:1 300 cd/m2 1920 x 1200 6ms HDMI
certifications: TCO 5.2 • UL/cUL • CB • CE • ErP • FCC • CCC • TUV-GS • TUV-ERGO • ISO9241-307 • BSMI • Gost-R • C-Tick • VCCI • PSB • NOM • J-MOSS • RoHS • Windows 7 WHQL • Mac Compliance • Energy Star
description: The ASUS PA248Q features a 16:10 aspect ratio, 1920 x 1200 A+ IPS LED-backlit panel for 100% sRGB and 72% NTSC colour reproduction; addititionally, along with a 178° wide viewing angle, it ensures quality visuals and minimal onscreen colour shift from almost any viewing position. With ASUS Smart Contrast Ratio (ASCR) of 80,000,000:1 and 300cd/m2 of brightness, the ASUS PA248Q enhances display contrast and sharpness - by adjusting the luminance of the backlight to achieve the darkness black and brightest white - delivering lifelike visuals. Customized hue and saturation control with 6 colour adjustment allows user to adjust six colours (red, green, blue, cyan, magenta and yellow) independently without effecting other colours. ASUS PA248Q also delivers ultra-smooth visuals thanks to a 6ms (GTG) response time - ensuring users have a lag-free viewing experience when it comes to watching movies or playing games. Games played under the PA248Q are more vivid - as all details can be seen and true colour can be shown with the PA248Q.
in the box: Asus PA248Q (24 inch) LCD Monitor • Cable tie • DVI cable • VGA cable • Power cord • DisplayPort cable • USB 3.0 cable • Quick start guide • Support CD • Warranty Card • Color pre-calibration report
usb ports: 2 x USB (1 x Upstream, 1 x Downstream)
